chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Unfortunately, the phone is still not shipped. Please give me an update.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

If you don't send the device within 24 hours, we'll refund you.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901187187

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

The package has been delivered. 

If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
